title: City of New Orleans / Illini / Saluki Timetable
heading: Amtrak's City of New Orleans, Illini, Saluki
bottom_text:
Note:
Amtrak only carries passengers between Homewood, IL and Chicago if they are connecting to another Amtrak train at Chicago.
Metra provides regular service between Homewood, IL and Chicago on the Metra Electric line.

Local connecting trains are provided at Chicago and Homewood by Metra, and at New Orleans, streetcars by NORTA.
